CHAT.comment: MAYO FOUNDATION FOR MEDICAL EDUCATION AND RESEARCH, ET AL., Petitioners v. UNITED STATES
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MATTHEW D. ROBERTS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:46 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
